sentence.Network_en: He's written a few overtly political lyrics over the years.
sentence.Network_cn: 他这些年写了几首政治色彩鲜明的抒情诗。

sentence.Network_en: There were some overtly erotic scenes in the film.
sentence.Network_cn: 影片中有一些公开色情场面.

sentence.Network_en: Nietzsche rejected God's law and wrote some overtly blasphemous things.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼采拒绝上帝的律法,并且写了一些渎神的作品.

list.abs: For years , everyone thought that China would overtly attack Taiwan ., 多年来 , 人人都以为大陆会公然打台湾.
as time progressed the can-cans seen at the Moulin Rouge became more and more vulgar and overtly erotic , causing much public outrage .随着时间的推移，红磨坊的康康舞变得越来越粗俗且露骨的色情，引起了很多公共暴力事件。

Addison Gayle's recent work , for example , judges the value of Black fiction by overtly political standards , rating each work according to the notions of Black identity which it propounds .例如，阿狄森·盖尔的最新著作，就用了公开的政治标准来判定黑人小说的价值，按照作品中所提出的黑人个体的各观念对每个作品进行评价。
Mr Nawaz does not overtly accuse America of sabotaging the plane ., 纳瓦斯先生并没有公然谴责美国阴谋破坏飞机的行为.

entry.tran: 公开的；明显的；不隐藏的
entry.def: An overt action or attitude is done or shown in an open and obvious way.

example.ex: His recent productions have been beautifully crafted works with little overt political content...
example.tran: 他最近所创作的都是些精雕细琢的作品，少有鲜明的政治内容。

example.ex: Although there is no overt hostility, black and white students do not mix much.
example.tran: 虽然黑人学生与白人学生之间没有公开的敌意，但他们也不怎么来往。
